en: This child has too much affection for his mother.

ngiemboon: Ndyɛ̀ʼ ɔ̀ gÿo tà nyìŋ júʼ.
À nyě  te tó ka? Ndyɛ̀ʼ aa mánzsè.
en: Has he not come yet? Maybe he's on his way.

ngiemboon: Ndyɛ̀ʼ tsɔ́ à gwǎ gɔɔn à tè zsé ngie ɔ̀ ge júʼ wɔ́.
en: Perhaps when he said it he didn't know that you could understand.

ngiemboon: Aa nyìŋ ndyɛ̀ʼɛ, n tè ne ńzsé yé wɔ́.
en: He's a stranger, I don't know him.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na pi pie pi ne sɔgɔ mekáŋ pɛ́ʼɛ andÿèen gwɔ́ wɔ̌?
en: Among you who wash the plates, who is the rinser?
